amendment.description: To provide for common sense limitations on salaries for contractor executives and employees involved in border security.

action.text: Amendment SA 1268 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Manchin.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1268, under the order of 6/19/2013, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 26. Record Vote Number: 155.
